com.twitter.heron.scheduler.yarn

Class HeronMasterDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.scheduler.yarn.HeronMasterDriver

  • public class HeronMasterDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    HeronMasterDriver serves Heron's YARN Scheduler by managing containers / processes for Heron TMaster and workers using REEF framework. This includes making container request for topology, providing package needed to start Heron components and killing containers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  HeronMasterDriver.HeronCompletedTaskHandler
      Tasks will be closed when on a restart request from user.
      class  HeronMasterDriver.HeronExecutorLauncher
      Once the container starts, this class starts Heron's executor process.
      class  HeronMasterDriver.HeronRunningTaskHandler
      This class manages active tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • killTopology

        public void killTopology()

      • restartTopology

        public void restartTopology()
        REEF will retain all YARN containers. Currently running heron-executors/REEF-tasks will be killed and new REEF-tasks representing previously running heron-executor will be started.

        public void restartContainer(java.lang.String id)
